name: APIDoc v5 - Complete Examples
description: Comprehensive examples demonstrating all APIDoc v5 features
title: APIDoc v5 Examples

header.title: APIDoc v5 Examples
header.content:
# Complete APIDoc v5 Examples

This documentation demonstrates all features of APIDoc v5:

## Examples Included

- **01-basic-api**: Simple REST API endpoints
- **02-openapi**: OpenAPI 3.0 integration
- **03-models**: Sequelize ORM model documentation
- **04-mqtt**: MQTT protocol documentation
- **05-i18n**: Internationalization support
- **06-versioning**: API version management
- **07-authentication**: JWT and OAuth authentication
- **08-apiSchema**: TypeScript interface integration
- **09-code**: Embedded code examples
- **10-markdown**: Markdown content in API docs
- **11-multi-language**: Multi-language API documentation
- **12-tsdoc**: TypeScript & JSDoc comments

## Features

- ✅ REST API Documentation
- ✅ MQTT Protocol Support
- ✅ OpenAPI 3.0 Export
- ✅ TypeScript Integration
- ✅ Sequelize Models
- ✅ Multi-language Support
- ✅ Version Management
- ✅ Authentication Patterns

footer.title: About APIDoc v5
footer.content:
## APIDoc v5

APIDoc v5 is a modern API documentation generator with support for:

- REST APIs
- MQTT/IoT protocols
- OpenAPI 3.0
- TypeScript schemas
- Multiple output formats

Visit [apidoc.app](https://apidoc.app) for more information.
